description: Weekly laboratory exercises involving preparation with online prelabs, collaboration with a partner, and analysis of results. Requires completion of 8 labs and prelabs for passing. Focuses on experiments related to electromagnetism, optics, and quantum mechanics.

Two invigilated tests (weeks 3 and 5) assessing content from weeks 1-4. Each test includes 4 questions, lasts 40 minutes, and draws from a practice question bank. Covers conceptual problem-solving, mathematical techniques, and graphical analysis.

Two invigilated tests (weeks 8 and 10) assessing content from weeks 5, 7-9. Each test includes 4 questions, lasts 40 minutes, and uses practice materials. Focuses on electromagnetism, optics, quantum mechanics, and data interpretation.
